New Records: West Indies scored their highest total in a men's T20 World Cup match with 218/5
Key Match Events: Pooran scored 98 runs, McCoy took three wickets, and Afghanistan were dismissed for 114
Pre-Game Insights: The match was crucial for both teams to maintain their unbeaten records in the group stage
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies finished the group stage with a perfect record, setting up well for the Super Eight
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at St Lucia, with friendly conditions for batters
